name: Trigger Henry
description:
Gameplay

There is always another contender who dares the challenge to find a way up. There have been many great people going insane trying to overcome all 3 stages.
Every jump gets you one step closer to winning, or does it? One wrong footstep and your progress will be lost!
Oh, and before I forget, Henry will start talking you down, literally.

Specialities

  • Triggering Comments
  • 3 Nerve-Racking Stages
  • Over 150 jumps
  • No Checkpoints
  • Steam Achievements
  • Map made with love <3


You will get between 2 and ∞ hours of pure despair.
Up to this point, nobody has ever reached the top!
